name: StreetCraft
description: StreetCraft is an online shooting game for fun. We are trying to provide funny and hilarious battle experiences for shooting game players. Just do it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
